N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 402.8 - Notification of criminal charges or convictions incurred subsequent to hiring

State Regulations
(a) Upon receiving
notification from the division that there is a pending criminal action or
proceeding, or conviction, with regard to an employee, the department shall
promptly notify an authorized person(s) of a provider of the allegation or new
conviction. (b) The provider shall
determine whether the action or proceeding or conviction presents a threat to
the health, safety and well-being of a resident or patient. Notes
